titles.title: A concurrent resolution calling for the President to uphold American rights under the United States-People's Republic of China Cultural Agreement and other matters.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 3/25/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that: (1) the United States should expel one reporter of the People's Republic of China from the United States; and (2) the Secretary of State should inform the Chinese Government that if another American reporter is expelled from China, the United States would consider the cultural relations agreement between the United States and China null and void.
